name: @iamqc/cc-session
description: Claude Code session management and packaging utilities

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir=dist --target=node --splitting --format=esm && bun link && bunx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public
